statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data
SELECT id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT product_name, category, sale_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY category
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, product_name, CONCAT(category, ' - ', product_name) AS full_description FROM sales_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, category, sale_amount * 1.1 AS sale_amount_with_tax FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 500 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sales_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, forecasted_sale_amount FROM sales_forecast WHERE forecasted_sale_amount >= 500;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 500 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, sum(sale_amount) as total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, date(sale_date) as sale_day FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount < 200;
SELECT product_name, forecasted_sale_amount FROM sales_forecast WHERE forecast_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY forecasted_sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 100
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price >= 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC;

SELECT s.sale_id, s.sale_date, p.product_name, c.customer_name FROM sales_data s JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id JOIN customers c ON s.sale_id = c.customer_id ORDER BY s.sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT date, quantity, total_price FROM sales_data WHERE date='2022-09-15';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_name, category, price, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products GROUP BY category HAVING AVG(price) > 50;
SELECT date, sales_prediction FROM forecasts WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT order_id, quantity, unit_price FROM sales_data WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, category, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_rate, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY order_date DESC, quantity;
SELECT product_id, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, city, country, email FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_rate, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE discount_rate >= 0.1 ORDER BY start_date ASC, promotion_name;
